pages.text: The blood of nearby animals was enough for the sapling to grow into a decayed tree. The wood that makes up the newly grown tree seems to have a few unique properties that may be useful, but unfortunately the tree itself lacks leaves. It looks like I'll need to make more saplings manually.

On occasion, a few logs will grow with holes in them. It seems that these new, hungry logs are capable of draining blood from nearby animals and storing it...$(br2)I could probably extract the blood from these, much like a bee's nest.
